title: Happiness
definitions: The state of being happy.
A feeling of pleasure or contentment.
description: A state of being happy or experiencing pleasure.

title: Sadness
definitions: The state of being sad or unhappy.
A feeling of sorrow or grief.
description: The state of being sad or unhappy.

title: Anger
definitions: A strong feeling of displeasure or rage.
A strong feeling of hostility or fury.
description: A strong feeling of displeasure, rage, or hostility.

title: Love
definitions: An intense feeling of deep affection or fondness.
A strong or passionate affection towards someone or something.
description: An intense feeling of affection or fondness.

title: Fear
definitions: An unpleasant emotion caused by the belief that someone or something is dangerous, likely to cause pain, or a threat.
A feeling of anxiety concerning the outcome of something or the safety and well-being of someone.
description: An unpleasant emotion caused by the belief of danger or threat.

title: Excitement
definitions: A feeling of great enthusiasm or eagerness.
The state of being emotionally aroused and stimulated.
description: A feeling of great enthusiasm or eagerness.

title: Surprise
definitions: An unexpected or astonishing event, fact, or thing.
The act of surprising or the state of being surprised.
description: An unexpected or astonishing event, fact, or thing.

title: Disgust
definitions: A feeling of revulsion or profound disapproval.
A strong aversion or repugnance towards something.
description: A feeling of revulsion or profound disapproval.

title: Confusion
definitions: A state of being bewildered or unclear in one's mind.
A lack of understanding or uncertainty.
description: A state of being bewildered or unclear in one's mind.

title: Peace
definitions: The state of being free from disturbance or conflict.
A state of tranquility or harmony.
description: The state of being free from disturbance or conflict.

title: Pride
definitions: A feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's achievements, qualities, or possessions.
A sense of self-respect or self-worth.
description: A feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's achievements, qualities, or possessions.

title: Jealousy
definitions: A feeling of envy or resentment towards someone's possessions, qualities, or luck.
A state of fear or suspicion of rivalry or unfaithfulness.
description: A feeling of envy or resentment towards someone's possessions, qualities, or luck.

title: Hope
definitions: A feeling of expectation and desire for a certain thing to happen.
A feeling of trust.
description: A feeling of expectation and desire for a certain thing to happen.

title: Grief
definitions: Intense sorrow, especially caused by someone's death.
Deep sadness or mental anguish.
description: Intense sorrow, especially caused by someone's death.

title: Boredom
definitions: The state of being bored; lack of interest or excitement.
The feeling of weariness and dissatisfaction due to a lack of interest or activity.
description: The state of being bored; lack of interest or excitement.

title: Courage
definitions: The ability to do something that frightens or challenges one; bravery.
Strength in the face of pain, grief, or danger.
description: The ability to do something that frightens or challenges one; bravery.

title: Gratitude
definitions: The quality of being thankful; readiness to show appreciation for and to return kindness.
A feeling of appreciation or thanks.
description: The quality of being thankful; readiness to show appreciation for and to return kindness.

title: Curiosity
definitions: A strong desire to know or learn something.
An eager interest in the nature or real truth of something.
description: A strong desire to know or learn something.

title: Envy
definitions: A feeling of discontented or resentful longing aroused by someone else's possessions, qualities, or luck.
A desire to have a quality, possession, or other desirable attribute belonging to someone else.
description: A feeling of discontented or resentful longing aroused by someone else's possessions, qualities, or luck.

title: Shame
definitions: A painful feeling of humiliation or distress caused by the consciousness of wrong or foolish behavior.
A strong sense of guilt, embarrassment, or remorse.
description: A painful feeling of humiliation or distress caused by the consciousness of wrong or foolish behavior.

title: Pity
definitions: The feeling of sorrow and compassion caused by the suffering and misfortunes of others.
A sympathetic concern and compassion for the sufferings or misfortunes of others.
description: The feeling of sorrow and compassion caused by the suffering and misfortunes of others.

title: Pleasure
definitions: A feeling of happy satisfaction and enjoyment.
The state of experiencing satisfaction, enjoyment, or gratification.
description: A feeling of happy satisfaction and enjoyment.

title: Embarrassment
definitions: A feeling of self-consciousness, shame, or awkwardness.
The state of feeling foolish, humiliated, or uneasy.
description: A feeling of self-consciousness, shame, or awkwardness.

title: Regret
definitions: A feeling of sadness, repentance, or disappointment over something that has happened or been done.
A sense of loss, disappointment, or dissatisfaction.
description: A feeling of sadness, repentance, or disappointment over something that has happened or been done.

title: Jealousy
definitions: A feeling of envy or resentment towards someone's possessions, qualities, or luck.
A state of fear or suspicion of rivalry or unfaithfulness.
description: A feeling of envy or resentment towards someone's possessions, qualities, or luck.

title: Satisfaction
definitions: A feeling of contentment or fulfillment.
The state of being pleased, gratified, or fulfilled.
description: A feeling of contentment or fulfillment.

title: Frustration
definitions: The feeling of being upset or annoyed, especially because of the inability to change or achieve something.
A state of dissatisfaction, discontentment, or annoyance.
description: The feeling of being upset or annoyed, especially because of the inability to change or achieve something.

title: Compassion
definitions: A feeling of deep sympathy and sorrow for the suffering or misfortune of others, accompanied by a strong desire to help.
A sympathetic consciousness of others' distress, together with a desire to alleviate it.
description: A feeling of deep sympathy and sorrow for the suffering or misfortune of others, accompanied by a strong desire to help.

title: Disappointment
definitions: A feeling of sadness or displeasure caused by the nonfulfillment of one's hopes or expectations.
The state of feeling let down or frustrated due to the failure of something to meet one's expectations.
description: A feeling of sadness or displeasure caused by the nonfulfillment of one's hopes or expectations.

title: Gratefulness
definitions: The state of being grateful; a feeling of thankfulness or appreciation.
The quality of being thankful and appreciative.
description: The state of being grateful; a feeling of thankfulness or appreciation.

title: Loneliness
definitions: The state of being alone or feeling isolated.
A feeling of sadness or abandonment due to a lack of companionship or social interaction.
description: The state of being alone or feeling isolated.

title: Contentment
definitions: A state of happiness and satisfaction.
The state of being content or fulfilled.
description: A state of happiness and satisfaction.

title: Relief
definitions: A feeling of reassurance and relaxation following the removal of stress, pain, or anxiety.
The state of being free from distress, worry, or discomfort.
description: A feeling of reassurance and relaxation following the removal of stress, pain, or anxiety.

title: Awe
definitions: An overwhelming feeling of reverence, admiration, or fear.
A feeling of profound respect and wonder inspired by something impressive or extraordinary.
description: An overwhelming feeling of reverence, admiration, or fear.

title: Nostalgia
definitions: A sentimental longing or wistful affection for the past, typically for a period or place with happy personal associations.
A bittersweet longing for things, persons, or situations of the past.
description: A sentimental longing or wistful affection for the past, typically for a period or place with happy personal associations.

title: Inspiration
definitions: The process of being mentally stimulated to do or feel something, especially to do something creative.
A sudden burst of creativity, motivation, or enthusiasm.
description: The process of being mentally stimulated to do or feel something, especially to do something creative.

title: Amusement
definitions: The state or experience of finding something funny or entertaining.
The feeling of being entertained or finding something humorous.
description: The state or experience of finding something funny or entertaining.

title: Annoyance
definitions: The feeling or state of being irritated or frustrated.
A feeling of mild to intense displeasure or irritation.
description: The feeling or state of being irritated or frustrated.

title: Serenity
definitions: The state of being calm, peaceful, and untroubled.
A state of tranquility, inner peace, and harmony.
description: The state of being calm, peaceful, and untroubled.
